scribbles.title: Setting Primer
scribbles.description: An unofficial, two-page overview of the Blades in the Dark setting. The perfect handout for new players.

scribbles.title: Witch Way to the Deathlands?
scribbles.description: The High Priestess of the Cat's Tail Coven has sent her most trusted witches to the Deathlands to find a cure for a horrific plague.

scribbles.title: The Rowan Affair
scribbles.description: Lady Whitethorn's retainers must retrieve a necklace from to convince her bethrothed—the esteemed Lord Rowan—of her innocence.

scribbles.title: Party at Whitethorn House
scribbles.description: Lady Whitethorn is throwing an extravagant party to elevate her social standing. Her retainers must ensure the party goes off without a hitch.

scribbles.title: A Heist for Hire
scribbles.description: A group of thieves are hired to steal a mysterious gemstone from a secure bank vault guarded by lethal automatons.

scribbles.title: Dark Descent
scribbles.description: A group of thieves are tasked with infiltrating the crypts below the Sanctorium of the Church of Ecstasy and aqcuiring a mysterious amulet.

scribbles.title: Stranger Tides
scribbles.description: Pirates hire a crew of scoundrels to steal precious leviathan blood from the belly of a leviathan hunter ship.
